name: Shazoom! Beverage Buying Simulator
description:
After gaining your superpowers from touching a magical staff, you realize that you are parched and decide to head over to the local supermarket to grab a drink. Since having these powers for such a short time, you have not been able to full control them yet. Due to this, you may knock over a few stands and aisles with non beverage related items on them. But you are determined to get your drink so you keep going. The goal is to get a drink and head to check out as fast as you can while trying not to crash into shelves and other supermarket supplies.

Beans Studios 2021
